description:
Now you can enjoy the beloved “Where is the Puppy” Book series from Sesame Workshop on your HP Touchpad! When Elmo sees a little black puppy on Sesame Street, he wants to find it a home – but first he has to catch it! Come with Elmo as he explores Sesame Street, meeting old friends, learning about the neighborhood, and looking for the little lost puppy.   ***

Big Bird has lost his Teddy Bear, Radar! As he and Elmo search for it, they find a lot of things that don't belong. What will they do with the box of junk they collect? And will they ever find Radar or Elmo's Puppy? Find out in this fun audio book app from the beloved “Where is the Puppy” book series!
 Narrated by Chris from Sesame Street.   **Features**  • Full Narration: Listen to Chris from Sesame Street read the story aloud.  • Page Flow: Move along each illustration in tandem with the story -- see a big story transformed for a small screen.  • Visual Table of Contents: Jump easily to your favorite parts of the story, or resume reading where you left off. 
 **About Us**  • Sesame Workshop is the nonprofit educational organization that revolutionized children’s media with the landmark Sesame Street. Learn more at www.sesameworkshop.org.   • ScrollMotion Kids helps families discover new ways to learn and play, combining your favorite childhood stories with the wonder of digital interactivity. To find out more, please visit www.scrollmotionkids.com
